name: Piggy Family Escape
description:
Enjoy the completely new game in which you will do good deeds for the Piggy and her family! Meet Four funny piggies in Amazingly Huge house!

You have moved to a new city. Your neighbor was a pig from your school. You fell in love with her, but she does not reciprocate. Complete various interesting missions with helping her and her family in household chores and win her heart! Her mom and dad are also against your secret relationship. Prove to them that you will be a worthy son-in-law.

Since her parents are against your meetings, you should keep your good deeds in a secret. Do not let them catch you and expose your secrets!

Once you decided to come to the Piggy and give her flowers. You saw her family and said hello. Her parents and her brother started to chase you and you managed to escape to your house and hide there. You decided not to give up and show your neighbors that you have only good intentions.

In this game, you will complete many interesting missions to help the piggy neighbor and her family such as: Find glasses for her father, find her favorite toy, fix her mother’s computer and daddy’s car, treat her brother’s fish and much more!

Explore the huge neighborhood location. You will love this run, escape & hide style lovely game!

Game Features:

• Various Piggy Family Characters! Meet four funny piggies in the huge house!

• Amazing Gameplay! Eat food like ice cream, burgers, milk or cakes for recovering of your stamina, run from the neighbours, throw objects to stun them, break glass, hide under beds! Seek for useful items. You will like this escape neighbor style game!

• Huge environments. Explore this huge location which includes a really large house!

• Control and sound settings. Set up controls as you like. You can adjust the sound, sensitivity and choose between the touchpad and joystick. Change the volume of music and sounds, set the language in the main menu settings.

• Beautiful 3D Graphics! Get pleasure from the High Quality textures and graphics. Enjoy a high-quality location that will let you feel yourself in the legendary Piggy World!

Feel the real atmosphere of the Neighbor Family with a granny escape gameplay!
